enb_long_title: Eighth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Review of methodological work: Harald Dovland (Norway) reported on the informal consultations on this issue and presented draft conclusions (FCCC/SBSTA/2002/L.17).
CHINA said he had been unable to take part in the consultations, and proposed several substantive amendments.
BANGLADESH, for the G-77/CHINA, noted that the G-77/China had discussed the issues internally and accepted these conclusions.
A revised text was agreed at the end of the SBSTA meeting, following informal consultations.
